leads.lead_text: Lower glume virtually as long as spikelets; culms never branched; grasses of alpine and subalpine bogs
Lower glume c. one-half as long as spikelets; culms frequently branched; a grass of lowlands and hills in the east (not alpine)
Spikelets 6–8 mm long; male florets distinctly awned
Spikelets 5–6 mm long; male florets awnless or minutely awned
